channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The broke college student's guide to managing money
item.description: For college students who don't have a lot of money, it can be tough to wrap your head around student loans, credit cards and a tight budget. A financi...

item.title: Charlie Kirk Was Practicing Politics the Right Way
item.description: The foundation of a free society is the ability to participate in politics without fear of violence. To lose that is to risk losing everything.

item.title: What we know about the shooting death of conservative activist Charlie Kirk
item.description: Kirk was killed Wednesday while speaking at a campus event in Utah. There is no suspect in custody.

item.title: Israel has hunted its top enemies around the Middle East. What has it achieved?
item.description: Israel's surprise attack in Qatar on Tuesday targeting Hamas' top political leaders was the latest in a campaign aimed at hunting down Israel's top en...

item.title: The Manhunt for Charlie Kirk’s Killer, and Putin’s Defiant Message
item.description: Plus, why firefighters are sounding an alarm.

item.title: After 10 years of black hole science, Stephen Hawking proven right
item.description: Researchers have spent ten years improving the massive detectors they use to catch shockwaves from colliding black holes, and now the science is preci...

item.title: UK Ambassador to the U.S., Peter Mandelson, Forced Out Over Epstein Links
item.description: The British government said it had withdrawn the envoy after newly revealed emails showed the depth of his relationship with Jeffrey Epstein.

item.title: Lab results confusing? Some patients use AI to interpret them, for better or worse
item.description: While patients wait to hear back from their doctors about test results, many turn to AI assistants for answers. There are issues with privacy and accu...

item.title: What Drove Israel’s Attack on Hamas in Qatar?
item.description: Israeli officials and analysts say that revenge for the Hamas-led 2023 attack on Israel, and frustration over moribund Gaza truce negotiations, inform...

item.title: South Korean Leader Warns of U.S. Investments After Hyundai-LG Plant Raid
item.description: President Lee Jae Myung made the comments as hundreds of South Korean workers swept in an immigration raid were expected to fly home on Thursday.

item.title: Drone Barrage Over Poland Was a Test for NATO, and the U.S.
item.description: A continent already on edge over the Ukraine war sees a Russian challenge to NATO readiness and to an America that wants to disengage from Europe.

item.title: Nepal’s Young Protesters Find an Unlikely Partner: The Army

item.description: President Lee Jae Myung made the comments as hundreds of South Korean workers swept in an immigration raid were expected to fly home on Thursday.
